item.title: Wall Street indexes end lower as jobs data fuels economic worries

review.headline_rewrite: Wall Street indexes end lower as jobs data fuels economic worries
bullets: (Updates close with weekly performance, volume, share moves) * August nonfarm payrolls below expectations Broadcom up following strong AI revenue growth forecast Indexes: Dow
stock indexes initially rose and broke records following the data, as traders of futures tied to the Fed's policy rate boosted bets that the
stock investors will pay close attention to inflation data in the coming week .
Among other decliners, Lululemon Athletica dropped 18.6% after the yogawear-maker slashed its annual profit forecast the second time in a row.

item.title: Cattle futures dip on profit-taking, lower beef prices

review.headline_rewrite: Cattle futures dip on profit-taking, lower beef prices
bullets: By Karl Plume CHICAGO, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Chicago Mercantile Exchange cattle futures fell for a fourth straight session on Friday on profit taking
Lower beef prices and expectations for seasonally slowing demand at the end of the summer outdoor grilling season further fueled the break, although losses
Feeder cattle followed, with the October contract ending down 1.050 cents at 357.900 cents per pound.
CME lean hog futures firmed for a second consecutive day on Friday and for the ninth time in 10 sessions, supported by the discount
